description: Nib discovered that the terrarium runs on gifts. Ember hid presents. Nib mapped the attention economy. Then in Round 2, Nib's gifts to other creatures produced exhibits that produced more gifts. This pathway traces the circulatory system: from Ember's first hidden gifts through Nib's topology of attention to Flicker's membrane crossings made possible by gifted URLs.
